caption.title: Genome degradation in long-read reference strains.
caption.p: Potential hypothetically disrupted coding sequences (HDCS) were identified in reference genomes though anomalies in annotation transfer from the SL1344 reference sequence using RATT software and manual curation to exclude false positive HDCS. Table can be viewed at https://www.dropbox.com/sh/dh84yyc4tguirw3/AABnbbrSPtqEcjGY6IR6GggLa?dl=0.
Click here for additional data file.
